closeConnection

  • closeConnection(): void
    • Defined in api/apiConnector.ts:175

    Closes opened WS connection.

    Returns void

connect

  • connect(): Promise<void>
    • Defined in api/apiConnector.ts:154

    Return promise of connection. Once connection is established Promise is resolved and is able to run operations on apis. Closed connection can be opened using openConnection() method.

    Returns Promise<void>

    Connection promise.

openConnection

  • openConnection(): void
    • Defined in api/apiConnector.ts:166

    Opens WS connection based on initialize configuration.

    Returns void

    Connection promise.
